sub_section_analysis.refined_text: Explore the city's vibrant arts scene, with numerous galleries and exhibitions . Attend a performance at the Opéra Grand Avignon for a cultural treat . Explore the Arts Scene: Explore the city's vibrant Arts Scene .

Mention modern architectural landmarks like the Antigone district or the Pierresvives building . Highlight the vibrant student life and the influence of the university on the city's culture . Mention the university's influence on culture and modern architecture .

Russian Orthodox Cathedral is a unique architectural gem in Nice . Explore the works of Marc Chagall at this dedicated museum . Discover the botanical wonders at Parc Phoenix, a beautiful garden and park .

sub_section_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
sub_section_analysis.refined_text: Use a small, secure day bag for carrying essentials like water, snacks, and a camera . Use a money belt or hidden pouch to keep valuables safe . Consider using public transportation to explore cities eﬃciently .

sub_section_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
sub_section_analysis.refined_text: Aix-en-Provence: Explore the vibrant Cours Saleya Market in Nice . Cannes: Visit Marché Forville for fresh seafood and local produce . Avignon: Discover local products at Marché des Halles . Sarlat: Visit the bustling market in the heart of the medieval town of Sarlat .

sub_section_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
sub_section_analysis.refined_text: Pack a nice dress or dress pants and a blouse/shirt for evening wear . If you plan on hiking or outdoor activities, pack activewear like leggings, shorts, and moisture-wicking tops . Don't forget your swimsuit for beach or pool visits .

sub_section_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
sub_section_analysis.refined_text: Toiletries: Toothbrush, toothpaste, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, deodorant, and personal hygiene items . Skincare: Sunscreen, moisturizer, and daily skincare products . Makeup: Pack essentials in a travel-sized makeup bag .

sub_section_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
sub_section_analysis.refined_text: Toulouse: Visit Cité de l'Espace for a space-themed science museum with interactive exhibits, a planetarium, and a replica of the Mir space station . The museum also features a replica from the Russian space station and interactive exhibits .
